page.title: 15RECREATION IN SKERRIES
page.content: {Skerries Hall { Skerries has{dances}in winter and a person who is going to get married has a{reception}in the hall. Skerries people have other people from Shetland to come and entertain them with concerts. The young people have{discos occasionally at weekends. At the beginning of the year we have a buffet supper to present the sports trophies. In winter people play each other at{badminton, pool}and{snooker. They also play{tabletennis}and they have a{bowling}tournament in January and the older people play bowls. There is very little{outdoor sports but we hope to get a multicourt.
